content: व्यादिश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To order, command; समीरणो नोदयिता भवेति व्यादिश्यते केन हुताशनस्य <ls>Ku. 3. 21</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 3.">13.</ls> {@--2@} To assign or appoint to (a duty). {@--3@} To divide, distribute. {@--4@} To point, indicate, show. {@--5@} To teach, instruct. {@--6@} To foretell, declare beforehand.
